topic.title: How to Factory Reset Htek Phones
topic.shortdesc: This guide takes Htek UC926E running firmware 2.0.4.6.13 as an example.

ol.li:
Find the phone IP address.
Navigate to Menu Status Information on the phone.

Log in the phone web interface with your username and password.
username: admin
password: admin
Go to Management Upgrade , click Reset to Factory.

Click OK to reset the phone.
The phone will be reset successfully after startup.
Do not power off during phone startup.
